title: 39: No Such Thing As A Rocking Chair In Space
content: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss irritated astronauts, meaty rain, Britain's loudest snorer, and the garden party you don't want to get invited to.
contentSnippet: Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Andy (@andrewhunterm) and Anna (@nosuchthing) discuss irritated astronauts, meaty rain, Britain's loudest snorer, and the garden party you don't want to get invited to.
